articles.title: Uber and Momenta will test fully driverless cars in Germany
articles.description: Uber and one of its many robotaxi partners, Momenta, will test fully driverless cars in Germany next year. The news comes as Europe continues to lag behind the US and China in the number of commercially operational robotaxi services. The companies say they will test Level 4 autonomous vehicles in Munich starting in 2026. (Level […]
articles.author: Andrew J. Hawkins
